61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.name: ARCO
61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.description: Módulo para registrar las incidencias de Acceso, Rectificación, Cancelación y Oposición para cumplir con la LOPD.
61b89db630a932d03db6d76dabca61a6.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.

9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.name: Follow Record
9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.description: Module that permits following changes on any record for any user. This module will send notifications to all users subscribed to a record.
9d479be6b61c671b9bf2b79013014db5.author: Joe Bordes

d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.name: Adequacy
d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.description: This project-like module is part of the Adequacy functionality. It represents the actual implementation process in the company designated by the flow and steps and controls the status of implementation of the adequacy project.
d51886e9ff11c8667ddda0973c2757e8.author: JPL TSolucio, S.L.
